dlgLine.text: 'Bout damn time, Alan!
Oh... You're not Alan. So... What's your deal?

dlgAnsw.text: I was just going to ask you the same thing.
Just trying to get a drink - this is a bar, isn't it?
I'm looking for survivors. You realize the dead are walking around out there, right?

dlgLine.text: I don't know... Been here for awhile. What day is it anyway? Eh... guess it doesn't matter.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: All the top shelf stuff is gone. Help yourself to the well swill. Not my bar, I don't care.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Yeah, yeah... Sucks, huh?

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Hey, you're alive, do you know if there's, like, somewhere safe around here? I'm kind of tired of pretzels, cigarettes, and shitty Texas beer.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -
- New Answ -

dlgLine.text: It's hot as balls too.

dlgAnsw.text: I'm from a shelter. There are other survivors there. You're welcome to stay, if you follow the rules.
Who else is here? Are you alone?
I could take you with me... but what would I get in return?

dlgLine.text: Holy shit - you're Aggro Moss! I saw you play here a few weeks ago! We talked - I'm Lane, the DJ. Bought you a drink - remember?
Um... Hey.
What the hell are you still doing here? Oh, man, you can totally come with us - we've got a shelter and food and even power... sometimes.
Um... Maybe - dial it back a bit, dude.

dlgAnsw.text: It's true - you're welcome to come with us.
Calm down, Lane. He is right, though - you can come with us if you want.
Do you have any skills we can use? Food is tight.
I've got a position in mind for you. Of course, I'm going to need a demo before I say yes.

dlgLine.text: Um... Okay. What the hell, right? Not like anything was happening here. Well, Alan was here, but who knows if he's coming back.

dlgAnsw.text: Who's Alan?
Let's gather up anything we can use and get out of here.

dlgLine.text: All by myself. Well, um, this guy Alan was here with me, but who knows if he'll be back.
But if you're thinking of trying anything, then let me warn you - I gotta shiv ready to go ass to eye, so keep your hands to yourself.

dlgAnsw.text: Who's Alan?
I could take you with me... but what would I get in return?

dlgLine.text: The fuck's that supposed to mean?

dlgAnsw.text: I was wondering if you had any skills that would be useful to the group.
What do you think it means?
Safety's got a going rate and you could say the price is going down.

dlgLine.text: What, like, job skills? I play rock music - what do you think?

dlgAnsw.text: Eh, we'll find something for you. Welcome to the group.
That works. Let's go.
So... No real world skills, then?

dlgLine.text: All I hear is 'punch me where I piss, please.'

dlgAnsw.text: Not my ju- I mean, I'm sorry. I could use an ally with some fight in them.
What I meant to say was - why don't you come with us.
I like 'em with a little fight in them...

dlgLine.text: Who are you - my guidance counselor? The fuck, man. Didn't know you needed a resume to be in your survivor club.

dlgAnsw.text: I apologize - of course you can join up with the rest of us.
I can't feed just anybody. You just don't make the cut.

dlgLine.text: Boohoo. Now fuck off, would you?

dlgAnsw.text: I'll go, soon as I take what I need from here.
Good luck to you. Bye.

dlgLine.text: Take it - whatever... I'm not going to be sticking around much longer. You touch me, though, and I will smash your fucking face in, just fyi.

dlgAnsw.text: <The woman watches you carefully.>

dlgLine.text: My manager. And my backing band. And my driver. And my ex. He can take care of himself. Fucking Alan.

dlgAnsw.text: Are you sure you don't want to wait for him?
Let's go then.

dlgLine.text: No. Let's just go.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Just let me pack my guitar and I'll be ready to split. By the way - I'm Aggro.

dlgAnsw.text: Aggro? What kind of name is that?
Nice to meet you. Let's take what we can, then we'll get going.

dlgLine.text: You want a fight? Bring it, bitch.

dlgAnsw.text: <The woman quickly produces a knife and rushes you.>

dlgLine.text: Fine... Just keep your goddamn hands to yourself. Seriously.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: Fine. Ass...

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: It's short for ' fuck off' - there, explained.

dlgAnsw.text: Right. Let's go.
If you want to sound like you're a Decepticon, that's your business. Follow me.

dlgLine.text: Okay. I mean, I guess I was waiting for Alan, but who knows if he's coming back.

dlgAnsw.text: Who's Alan?
Great. Let's take what we can and go.

dlgLine.text: Yeah - who's Alan?
My manager. And my backing band. And my driver. And my ex. He can take care of himself. Fucking Alan.
Well - if you're not waiting for him, you should totally come with us. I mean, you know, if you want.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: I could help you carry out your equipment-
S'alright - I got it, dude. Let me pack up my guitar and we'll hit the road.

dlgAnsw.text: I guess you're coming along. Follow us.
You owe me, Lane. Let's go, lady.

dlgLine.text: The fuck's that supposed to mean?
Yeah, Jesus - what's wrong with you?

dlgAnsw.text: I just, um... Nothing - let's all go back to the shelter.
Just look at her - what else do you think she'd be good for?

dlgLine.text: Uh... fine. Just keep your hands to yourself if you don't want them chopped off and fed to those fucking things out there.

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -

dlgLine.text: I'm what?
Calm down - it's not usually like this. I hope.
You want to get curb-stomped, motherfucker?! Not you, goggles, the other one.

dlgAnsw.text: I apologize. It's just the heat and the stress... I'm sorry.
She's got no skills - waste of space. Come on, let's go.
You heard me.

dlgLine.text: Yeah, you just keep fucking walking.
No - you know what? I'm going to stay too. You're being kind of a cockbag and this is Aggro Freakin' Moss, so...
Go... You too.

dlgAnsw.text: Come on Lane. Let's go.
Fine, stay here, Lane! See if I care. But don't ever show your face in Splendid again.
Lane, you're walking out of here with me or you're not walking out at all.

dlgLine.text: What's that? You want to a bottle in your eye?
What the fuck? This is Aggro Moss - I should kick your ass for that.
Don't need the help... C'mon, fuckface - let's go!

dlgAnsw.text: <The woman quickly produces a knife and rushes you.>

dlgLine.text: No. I'm staying.
Oh, dammit...

dlgAnsw.text: I said, 'let's go!'
Fine, stay here, Lane! See if I care. But don't ever show your face in Splendid again.
Lane, you're walking out of here with me or you're not walking out at all.

dlgLine.text: I... No, I'll be fine with her.
...Right.
Tell Davis 'goodbye' for me. Now... You should probably go.
I know a place we can hideout - follow me.

dlgAnsw.text: <Lane and Aggro leave.>

dlgLine.text: I'm sorry, Aggro... I guess I should go.
Whatever.

dlgAnsw.text: <The woman watches you carefully.>

dlgLine.text: Fuck you - now I know I'm doing the right thing.
Hell is wrong with you people?!
C'mon, Aggro. I know a place we can hideout - follow me.
Whatever.

dlgAnsw.text: <Lane and Aggro leave.>

dlgLine.text: What? I play rock music - what do you think?
This is Aggro Moss! Aggro Moss! What kind of- of course she can come with.

dlgAnsw.text: Fine. Do you want to come back with us?
There is safety in numbers... Sure, you're in.
I'm sorry, we need doctors, soldiers, scientists - people with real skills. Not musicians.

dlgLine.text: Well, if she's out - so am I.
Uh, no, that's-
I mean it - I'll stay here if she's not allowed to go.

dlgAnsw.text: Fine. Aggro, you can come with us.
Come on Lane. Let's go.
Fine, stay here, Lane! See if I care. But don't ever show your face in Splendid again.
Lane, you're walking out of here with me or you're not walking out at all.

dlgLine.text: Hey - keep your fucking distance, man...

dlgAnsw.text: If I leave you here, you'll die. Just come with us.
Nevermind. Bye.

dlgLine.text: Fuck it. Whatever...

dlgAnsw.text: - New Answ -
